title: Pixel 3a and Pixel 5 notification and ringtones crackling
content:
I recently upgraded from a 3a which also shared the exact same issue after the last security update.

When the phone has been re started the notifications and ringtones are fine, after a few hours any notifications or the ringtone on incoming calls become severely distorted, crackling. (Its like a bad audio driver on a pc)

Has anyone else experienced this?
